import { useState } from "react"
import { useEffect } from "react"

export default function DNA ( { windowWidth } ) {

    const dna = ""
    const dnaArray = dna.split("")

    useEffect(() => {
        console.log(dnaArray.length)
    }, [dnaArray.length])

    const unitSize = 20
    const rowMargin = 7

    const [dnaContainerSize, setDnaContainerSize] = useState()
    const [bpPerRow, setBpPerRow] = useState()
    const [bpRows, setBpRows] = useState()
    const [bpCount, setBpCount] = useState([])

    window.addEventListener('resize', handleResize)

    function handleResize() {
        setDnaContainerSize(document.getElementById('dna').offsetWidth)
    }

    useEffect(() => {

        setBpPerRow(Math.floor((dnaContainerSize - 0.2) / unitSize))
    }, [dnaContainerSize])

    useEffect(() => {
        setBpRows(Math.ceil((dnaArray.length)/bpPerRow))
    }, [bpPerRow, dnaArray.length])

    useEffect(() => {
        const bp = [1]
        for (let i = 1; i < bpRows; i++) {
            bp.push(((i) * bpPerRow)+1)
        } 
        setBpCount(bp)
    }, [bpPerRow, bpRows])

    useEffect(() => {
        console.log(bpPerRow)
    }, [bpPerRow])

    const leftCounters = bpCount.map((num, index) => {
            return (
                <span key={num} style={{height: unitSize, width: 'fit-content', textAlign: 'center', marginBottom: rowMargin }}>{num}</span>
            )
    })

    const rightCounters = bpCount.map((num, index, array) => {
        return (
            <span key={num} style={{height: unitSize, width: 'fit-content', textAlign: 'center', marginBottom: rowMargin }}>{array[index+1]-1}</span>
        )
})

    const basePairs = dnaArray.map((bp, index) => {
        return (
            <span key={index} style={{height: unitSize, width: unitSize, textAlign: 'center', marginBottom: rowMargin }}>{bp}</span>
        )
    })

    return (
        <div id="dna-workspace" style={{ width: '100%', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'row', justifyContent: 'center' }}>
            <div style={{ marginTop: '1%', height: '100%', width: 'fit-content', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', alignItems: 'center' }}>{leftCounters}</div>
            <div id='dna' style={{ margin: '1%', height: 'fit-content', width: '94%', backgroundColor: 'beige', display: 'flex', flexWrap: 'wrap', userSelect: 'none' }}>
                {basePairs}
            </div>
            <div style={{ marginTop: '1%', height: '100%', width: 'fit-content', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', alignItems: 'center' }}>{rightCounters}</div>
        </div>
    )
}
